# there

related_questions.question: Bu Sri meminjam uang dikoperasi sebesar Rp.6.000.000 dengan bunga 18% setahun jika lamah meminjam 12 bulan .maka berapakah total pinjaman yang harus bu sri bayar kepada koperasi ?pakai jalan y plis ​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

bunga selama setahun atau 12 bulan =

18 x Rp. 6.000.000 = Rp. 1.080.000

pinjaman + bunga = Rp. 6.000.000 + Rp. 1.080.000 = Rp. 7.080.000

Total pinjaman yang harus di bayar ibu Sri adalah Rp. 7.080.000

Penjelasan:

bunga selama setahun atau 12 bulan =

18 x Rp. 6.000.000 = Rp. 1.080.000

pinjaman + bunga = Rp. 6.000.000 + Rp. 1.080.000 = Rp. 7.080.000

Total pinjaman yang harus di bayar ibu Sri adalah Rp. 7.080.000

semoga membantu^•^

related_questions.question: Bantu jawab plis pelajaran bhs inggris ​

9. Alucard : What do you think about our new classroom?    Ruby : ......... We need to clean it.
a. I think it's too small
b. I
c. I think it's very dirty
d. I
The text below is for question number 10 - 15
M​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

C. I think it's very dirty.

Penjelasan:

Ruby menjawab.... Kita perlu membersihkannya. Maka untuk mengisi jawaban yang tepat adalah I think it's very dirty yang artinya kurasa kelasnya kotor.

Semoga membantu ^_^

related_questions.question:
The text is for questions 20 to 21 *    a.Javanese Hawk.

b.Wonosadi Forest.

c.The writer’s cousin.

d.A hike in the forest

21.	“We sat down and relaxed under the shades of four gigantic and ancient trees.”The underlined word is closest in meaning to … . *


a.very big

b.very small

c.very old

d.very young

The text is a part of a song. Read it to answer questions 22 to 23.

I know a girl
She puts the color inside of my world
But she’s just like a maze
Where all the walls all continually change

Fathers, be good to your daughters
Daughters will love you like you do
Girls become lovers who turn into mothers
So mothers, be good to your daughters, too.

22.	What is the song about? *


a,Family.

b,Mothers.

c,Daughters

d,Fathers




​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

20. a. Javanese Hawk 21. a. Very Big 22. a. Family

Penjelasan:

Semoga TerEnt- Membantu! :D

Jawaban:

20. D. A hike in the forest

21. C. very old

22. C. daughters

Semoga terbantu✌

related_questions.question:
19. Indri    Sinta : Today is September 9.
Indri : I see, thanks
a. What day is it today? c. Is today the September 9?
b. What date is it today? d. When will we leave?​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

B. What date is it today?

Penjelasan: Date biasa digunakan jika jawaban memiliki angka seperti: Desember 4

Day biasa digunakan jika jawaban hanya memiliki hari tidak ada angka seperti: Friday

Jawaban:

a. What day is it today?

maaf kalo salah

related_questions.question: Bantuin w pliss , dan jgn ngarang yya ​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

c. eighteen

Penjelasan:

umur peter 14 th dan berbeda 4 tahun dari penulis. Jadi, umur penulis adalah 14 tahun ditambah 4 tahun = 18 tahun.
